summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: TRESemme Climate Control Shampoo, 32 Oz Review Date: 2015/06/12 Store: TRESemmé Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TRESemmé', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Weight': '2.55 Pounds', 'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 9.2 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '022400651576'} Review Text: I use this in rotation with a couple of other brands. The scent is pretty mild and it lathers richly and my hair does feel nice and clean and soft after using this for a few days. But....there can definitely be a build up if I use it for a week straight. My hair is long and very thick and after a week with this shampoo & matching conditioner I find my hair looks weighed down and flat. Review Title: Does a nice job when alternated with other shampoo every few days Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: eb5 Collagen Boosting Serum, 1 fl.oz. Review Date: 2015/11/28 Store: eb5 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Scent': 'Green Tea', 'Brand': 'eb5', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant'} Review Text: I'm not a big believer in all the hocus pocus claims made by every single women's skin care product on the market. They all say they will make your wrinkles or crows feet shrink or smooth out or give your 40 something face a "youthful" glow again. At best, these products moisturize, cleanse, and some provide some protection from sun exposure damage.

This serum from EB5 makes the usual claims, of course, but it's not as outrageously expensive as so many of the other brands. It's a creamy concoction and it takes very little to cover my entire face - the instructions say just use one pump and that is sufficient. There's a faint scent that makes me think of Asian food - I guess that's the sesame seed oil,but the scent fades quickly. It takes about ten minutes to fully absorb into my skin, so I am not using this immediately before going to bed. I haven't had any skin irritation or breaking out in a week. Nor have I noticed any visible difference in the overall condition of my skin and no "plumping" in my laugh lines. My face is soft and it feels just a moisturized as when I use only my regular moisturizer. So....four star rating for no negative reaction and for being a nice enough moisturizer requiring very little product. Review Title: Doesn't irritate my sensitive skin. Creamy, requires very little to use. No actual change to wrinkles. Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Facial Hair Remover for Women, ZACCER Painless Hair Removal Waterproof Shaver Razor with LED Light for Peach Fuzz Fine Hair Chin Cheek Upper Lip Review Date: 2018/10/03 Store: ZACCER Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'ZACCER', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Head Type': 'Rotary', 'Number of Blades': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '5.5 x 2.3 x 1.6 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '631517350052 680613790910'} Review Text: As much as I hate to admit it, getting close to 50 brings lots of unpleasant changes and some great ones. One of the ridiculous things is suddenly discovering random hairs on my face. Tweezing is certainly effective, but takes forever and is tiresome.

This is the first little shaver of this type I've used. It needs a single AA battery that is not included. It's reasonably quiet when running, has a little light and is easy to hold. It is completely painless as advertised - this actually shaves rather than ripping hair out like those epilator things. It works well and I don't really have any complaints. Review Title: Totally painless, needs a battery, but works as it should Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LilySilk Large Silk Scrunchies for Womens Girls Kids, Green, Pure 100 Real Natural Raw Mulberry Raw Silk, 6A Grade, Beautiful for Hair, Soft, Tie Scrunchies Silk Big Giant Review Date: 2019/11/19 Store: LilySilk Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.9 x 6.4 x 1.2 inches; 1.59 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'RDUS6111H-02A'} Review Text: I have very thick, very long hair and I work with horses and dogs daily. That means I've got a pony tail every day with a scrunchie. This one is a pretty deep green and it holds my thick hair well. The silk doesn't create friction or split ends and that's good. However, you only get one of these for the price and that is just ridiculous. This thing is no different from any other scrunchie out there except for the silk fabric and that still doesn't make it worth fifteen bucks. Review Title: Good scrunchie for ridiculous price Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly, Top Japanese Makeup Remover, Gentle Skin Cleanser, Mild Floral Fragrance, Non-Greasy, 7.8 Ounce Review Date: 2020/04/07 Store: Bioré Product Description: ['Bioré J-Beauty Makeup Removing Moisturizing Cleansing Jelly is a non-greasy makeup remover that removes dirt and impurities from deep below the surface of your skin. This top Japanese makeup remover glides on gently and leaves no sticky residue. Formulated with conditioning beauty essence, this jelly leaves skin feeling moisturized and free of makeup. Satisfaction Guaranteed. Limitations may apply.'] Average Rating: 4.4 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '1.56 x 2.5 x 7.25 inches; 10.08 Ounces', 'Item model number': '28077_obs', 'UPC': '019100264557', 'Manufacturer': 'Kao USA Inc.'} Review Text: Wipes like this are a fill in for actually washing your face with real soap and water, but they do come in handy sometimes. I was using these after working horses and shoveling stalls. The wipes are thick enough to get the grime off without tearing. However, after three days, my face broke out in two spots! My friend tried them and after three days, she says she's fine. So it's just me I guess. Review Title: Thick and good at removing grime Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: 2-Pack Puretize 16.9 Oz Hand Sanitizing Gel w/Pump Tops - Extra Strength 70% Ethyl Alcohol - Moisturizing Formula with Aloe Vera, Vitamin E & Botanical Extracts - Quick Drying Formula Review Date: 2020/06/16 Store: Pure Daily Care Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Pure Daily Care', 'Unit Count': '33.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Special Feature': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Package Dimensions': '7 x 6.5 x 4.5 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '810016711360'} Review Text: Between regular, every day germs and now Covid-19, we go through a bunch of sanitizer. It's in the cars, the house, the horse barn and luggage. We tend to use Purell in the giant wall dispensers in the house and barn, but these big bottles are nice too.

The sanitizer smells like what it is. This seems a bit thinner than the Purell, but dries quickly enough. I haven't noticed any sticky residue left behind or excessive drying of our skin. I'm taking one of these with me to West Texas tomorrow for use in the truck and cabin. It fits nicely in my overnight bag pocket. Review Title: Seems to work well, no weird residue left behind Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces. Review Date: 2020/08/10 Store: Qiray Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'} Review Text: Good grief. If you have thick, long hair, avoid these. The decorative bead things catch my hair and pull. Not cool. There is also less stretch and elasticity in these than with regular scrunchies- with thick hair that means these won't last long. Perhaps if your hair is very fine or very short you can make these work, but I can't stand them. Review Title: Pulls and tangles long hair Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Black Wolf - Men’s Ultra Hydrating Moisturizer - 1.7 Fl Oz – Soothe Dry, Patchy & Flaky Areas on your Skin - Fast Absorbing Formula Won't Feel Heavy or Greasy - Sulfate Free for Dry Skin Review Date: 2020/10/04 Store: Black Wolf Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Black Wolf', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.7 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '5.39 x 3.15 x 1.46 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'BLKWLF_MOIST_DRY', 'UPC': '850021340087'} Review Text: I've been using this on my feet rather than my face. It's just too heavy and thick for a face cream. After 4 days, my heels are definitely softer.

It seems to absorb reasonably quickly, but slower than my usual moisturizer and skin cream. I can't detect any perfumes in this and that's definitely good. Review Title: Nice for dry, cracked heels Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: LCPCX Horse grooming kit, horse brush kit with 2 pet gloves, suitable for horses, dogs, cattle, cats, bears and other hairy pet care tools Review Date: 2021/07/30 Store: LCPCX Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '8.9 x 4.3 x 1.78 inches; 11.99 Ounces'} Review Text: I don't really have any use for the gloves included in this set. The curry comb is what I wanted. It works like it should and removes excess hair without pinching. Our donkey seems to really prefer a curry comb to any other type of brush and he likes this one. Review Title: Good with coarse donkey hair Rating: 4.0 --------------------------------------------------

Do not repeat specific product names or details. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: TRESemme Climate Control Shampoo, 32 Oz Review Date: 2015/06/12 Store: TRESemmé Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'TRESemmé', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Item Weight': '2.55 Pounds', 'Product Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 9.2 inches; 2.55 Pounds', 'UPC': '022400651576'} Review Text: I use this in rotation with a couple of other brands. But....there can definitely be a build up if I use it for a week straight. raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns Summary:**

- **Hair Care Focus:** Prefers variety; uses different shampoos and conditioners to avoid product buildup. 
- **Skin Care Skepticism:** Shows cautious optimism towards skincare products, valuing gentle formulations and avoiding any that cause irritation.
- **Functional Beauty Tools:** Values efficiency and performance in beauty tools; dislikes ineffective products, especially when they don’t meet the needs of thick hair.
- **Price Sensitivity:** Questions the value of high-priced items, particularly when cheaper alternatives suffice in performance.
- **Overall Satisfaction:** Generally rates products between 3 to 5 stars, indicating a balanced approach towards satisfaction. Negative experiences involve irritation or dissatisfaction with product effectiveness.
- **Health & Hygiene Awareness:** Utilizes hand sanitizers regularly, prioritizing effective and non-drying options, especially in light of health concerns such as Covid-19.
- **Pet Care Product Utilization:** Engages in grooming activities for pets, highlighting a practical approach to pet care tools, specifically favoring effective grooming methods.
- **Sustainability Mindset:** Chooses products that do not irritate or damage personal health, reflecting a broader concern for gentle and sustainable beauty and grooming practices.

target_interaction.title: Strong chemical type scent
target_interaction.text:
This stuff smells. A lot. And it lingers for hours. I actually ended up washing my face all over again to get it off before going to sleep.

The lotion itself is smooth and didn't irritate my skin. It seems to absorb reasonably fast as well. But....that awful smell is a deal breaker for me.
target_interaction.title_meta: APIVITA Queen Bee Holistic Age Defense Night Cream 1.69 fl.oz. |Intensive Night Treatment That Speeds Skin Regeneration, Smooths Wrinkle & Increases Skin Elasticity with Royal Jelly & Hyaluronic Acid

videos.title: All you need to know about Apivita
